REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0396 reute b f BC-QUEBECOR-ISSUES-60-ML 03-30 0114

TEXT.TITLE: QUEBECOR ISSUES 60 MLN DLR CONVERTIBLE BOND
TEXT.BODY: Quebecor Inc <PQB.A>, the Canadian publishing concern, is issuing a 60 mln dlr convertible bond due May 14, 1997 bearing an indicated coupon of 5-3/4 to six pct, said Merrill Lynch Capital Markets as lead manager. The issue will be priced to have a conversion premium of 22 to 25 pct, with final terms to be set on Monday, April 6. The company's stock last traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange at 19-3/8. The securities will be listed in Luxembourg and are available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 dlrs. Fees include a one pct combined management and underwriting and a one pct selling concession. REUTER
